title: Likely cause of genetic change in four species 2

content.question: Predict the effects of the mutation on the structure and function of the resulting protein in species IV. Justify your prediction.

frqParts.text: Predict the effects of the mutation on the structure and function of the resulting protein in species IV. Justify your prediction.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
